segments.text: Welcome to the courtroom. This hearing is now in session.
segments.speaker: Judge

segments.text: Your Honor, the defense would like to present new evidence in this case.
segments.speaker: Defense Attorney

segments.text: Objection, Your Honor! This evidence was not disclosed during discovery.
segments.speaker: Prosecutor

segments.text: I'll allow it. Please proceed with your presentation of the evidence.
segments.speaker: Judge

segments.text: Thank you, Your Honor. As you can see from Exhibit A, the defendant was not at the scene during the time of the alleged incident.
segments.speaker: Defense Attorney
